oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: National Radio Pulpit - 1947-12-28 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC program National Radio Pulpit, originally broadcast 1947-12-28, part 2. Ralph Washington Sockman delivers a message entitled 'That Master Plan And You', with musical director George Shackley and announcer Robert Denton.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: The Master Plan And You (Ralph Washington Sockman) [continued from part 1] -- Jesus, My Lord, My God, My All ([Unidentified choir]) -- Closing statement (Ralph Washington Sockman) -- Closing statement (Robert Denton) -- Sweet Savior, Bless Us Ere We Go ([Unidentified choir]) -- Network announcement (Robert Denton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; National radio pulpit; Sockman, Ralph W. (Ralph Washington), 1889-1970; Shackley, George; Denton, Robert (Announcer)
